'''Boundless Origin''' is [[Kamisato Ayato]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* DMG dealt by the Extra Shunsuiken strikes is considered Normal Attack DMG.
* When this effect is ready, it will be indicated by a glow on Ayato's right wrist.
